column1: Kata Robata////This was a little different experience for me because I was out to a large work dinner where we ordered a bunch of different dishes and passed them around.   This allowed me to sample a bunch of items
column2: but the sample sizes didn't allow for great flavor profile.  Overall
column3: it was a very good experience and I would gladly come back here again.  To date
column4: it's my second favorite japanese/sushi restaurant in Houston.  At the same time
column5: it's not in the same planet as Uchi in terms of fish quality
column7: and creativity of the dishes.  As always
column8: my review is for the food only.
